name: Rubberskin
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Melee Tactics Toolbox © 2015, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (a piece of rubber or drop of tar)
text:
Your skin becomes more elastic, distributing crushing damage efficiently.

For the duration of the spell, all bludgeoning and falling damage you take is converted into nonlethal damage.

This spell has no effect if you're immune to nonlethal damage.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料（一块橡胶或沥青）
text_zh: 你的皮肤更有弹性，可以分散冲击力。法术持续时间内，你所受的所有钝击伤害和坠落伤害都会被转为瘀伤。当你免疫瘀伤时该法术无效。
